nodes.name: The Matrix
nodes.tagline: Welcome to the Real World

nodes.name: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
nodes.tagline: If he's crazy, what does that make you?

nodes.name: The Matrix Reloaded
nodes.tagline: Free your mind

nodes.name: The Matrix Revolutions
nodes.tagline: Everything that has a beginning has an end

nodes.name: The Devil's Advocate
nodes.tagline: Evil has its winning ways

nodes.name: A Few Good Men
nodes.tagline: In the heart of the nation's capital, in a courthouse of the U.S. government, one man will stop at nothing to keep his honor, and one will stop at nothing to find the truth.

nodes.name: Top Gun
nodes.tagline: I feel the need, the need for speed.

nodes.name: Bicentennial Man
nodes.tagline: One robot's 200 year journey to become an ordinary man.

nodes.name: Jerry Maguire
nodes.tagline: The rest of his life begins now.

nodes.name: Stand By Me
nodes.tagline: For some, it's the last real taste of innocence, and the first real taste of life. But for everyone, it's the time that memories are made of.

nodes.name: Charlie Wilson's War
nodes.tagline: A stiff drink. A little mascara. A lot of nerve. Who said they couldn't bring down the Soviet empire.

nodes.name: As Good as It Gets
nodes.tagline: A comedy from the heart that goes for the throat.

nodes.name: What Dreams May Come
nodes.tagline: After life there is more. The end is just the beginning.

nodes.name: Snow Falling on Cedars
nodes.tagline: First loves last. Forever.

nodes.name: The Polar Express
nodes.tagline: This Holiday Season... Believe

nodes.name: A League of Their Own
nodes.tagline: Once in a lifetime you get a chance to do something different.

nodes.name: You've Got Mail
nodes.tagline: At odds in life... in love on-line.

nodes.name: Sleepless in Seattle
nodes.tagline: What if someone you never met, someone you never saw, someone you never knew was the only someone for you?

nodes.name: Joe Versus the Volcano
nodes.tagline: A story of love, lava and burning desire.

nodes.name: When Harry Met Sally
nodes.tagline: Can two friends sleep together and still love each other in the morning?

nodes.name: That Thing You Do
nodes.tagline: In every life there comes a time when that thing you dream becomes that thing you do

nodes.name: The Replacements
nodes.tagline: Pain heals, Chicks dig scars... Glory lasts forever

nodes.name: RescueDawn
nodes.tagline: Based on the extraordinary true story of one man's fight for freedom

nodes.name: The Birdcage
nodes.tagline: Come as you are

nodes.name: Unforgiven
nodes.tagline: It's a hell of a thing, killing a man

nodes.name: Johnny Mnemonic
nodes.tagline: The hottest data on earth. In the coolest head in town

nodes.name: Cloud Atlas
nodes.tagline: Everything is connected

nodes.name: The Da Vinci Code
nodes.tagline: Break The Codes

nodes.name: V for Vendetta
nodes.tagline: Freedom! Forever!

nodes.name: Speed Racer
nodes.tagline: Speed has no limits

nodes.name: Ninja Assassin
nodes.tagline: Prepare to enter a secret world of assassins

nodes.name: The Green Mile
nodes.tagline: Walk a mile you'll never forget.

nodes.name: Frost/Nixon
nodes.tagline: 400 million people were waiting for the truth.

nodes.name: Hoffa
nodes.tagline: He didn't want law. He wanted justice.

nodes.name: Apollo 13
nodes.tagline: Houston, we have a problem.

nodes.name: Twister
nodes.tagline: Don't Breathe. Don't Look Back.

nodes.name: Cast Away
nodes.tagline: At the edge of the world, his journey begins.
